metadata.title: USN-6114-1 -- nth-check vulnerability
metadata.description: Yeting Li discovered that nth-check incorrectly handled certain inputs. If a user or an automated system were tricked into opening a specially crafted input file, a remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6114-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  node-nth-check - 1.0.1-1+deb10u1build0.20.04.1 No subscription required
